properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Rightward True False [Sequence [ClearSpirits [FadeOutSong 120] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Field Joining]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "It is done."] [Dialog "Everyone wears a blank face now..."] [Dialog "The Queen's messenger has informed me that I will take my master's stead."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Dialog "No one knew of my plan, not even Loch."] [Dialog "He had proposed that he leave his post and we again meet..."] [Dialog "I long for his company, but I asked him to defer his leave until the coming holiday."] [Dialog "Tomorrow my title will be made official and throughout that night I will hear them weep the way they once heard me..."] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Rightward] [Dialog "Knowing that they will all be passed over for the lowest of us..."] [Dialog "...their hearts writhe in anticipation of the torment I have planned for them..."] [Dialog "They now know what cost their cruelty has brought them due."] [Dialog "They will never forget the dread I have brought them."] [Dialog "It cannot be undone..."] [FadeOutSong 120] [Fade [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] 150] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 4] [KylaAdvent 5]] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Castle CastlePart3]] [Wait 120] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field Unlatch]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 4]]]
